refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculates a factor to raise/lower a frequency by a given amount of octaves.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Calculates a factor to raise/lower a frequency by a given amount of octaves.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: This function works at a-rate, i-rate, and k-rate.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: x -- a value expressed in octaves.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The value returned by the octave function is a factor. You can multiply a frequency by this factor to raise/lower it by the given amount of octaves.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the octave opcode. It uses the file octave.csd.
